about_the_game:
Created in the spirit of early console RPGs, this pack of 50 battlers by artist Tyler Warren brings to life fresh options for the professional and amateur game creator. Carefully crafted in a style comparable to the immensely popular Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series, this set features monsters ranging from cute to colossal. Trolls, bugs, slimes, elementals, beasts, animals, flyers, and many others!

Features:

  • 50 unique battlers
  • All 50 battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues!
  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other)
  • Art style similar in spirit to the classic whimsical RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
  • Remastered for sharper colors and better usability
  • Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MZ

    Terms of Use:

    * This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
    * OK to be used in Commercial projects
    * Contents can be edited
    * OK for use in games with gore
    * OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 1st 50" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 1st 50" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

 Created in the spirit of early console RPGs, this pack of 50 battlers by artist Tyler Warren brings to life fresh options for the professional and amateur game creator. Carefully crafted in a style comparable to the immensely popular Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series, this set features monsters ranging from cute to colossal. Trolls, bugs, slimes, elementals, beasts, animals, flyers, and many others!

  • Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other)

  • Remastered for sharper colors and better usability
